text: Simón Rodrigo Ramírez (born April 12, 1985 in Morón, Argentina) is an Argentine footballer who plays for J.J. de Urquiza of the Primera C in Argentina. ==Teams== * Argentinos Juniors 2006 * El Porvenir 2006-2007 * All Boys 2007-2009 * Cobreloa 2006-2007 * Deportivo Merlo 2010–2012 * J.J. de Urquiza 2012– ==Titles== * All Boys 2007-2008 (Primera B Metropolitana) ==References== * Profile at BDFA * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine footballers Category:Argentine expatriate footballers Category:Argentinos Juniors footballers Category:All Boys footballers Category:Cobreloa footballers Category:Deportivo Merlo footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Chile Category:Association football midfielders
title: Simón Ramírez (footballer, born 1985)
